item.title: TCP and UDP - Simple yet ConfusingðŸ¤”
item.description: TCP and UDP A simple open-ended question that can test your whole sort of knowledge. What will be addressed in this post? - The problem with packets (IP) - TCP pros and cons - TCP communication sample code - UDP pros and cons - UDP communication sample code - Some questions based on them To start, I was asked a question in an interview,
